EN.title: New development for sale in Marbella, Málaga

Marbella Lake is a new development of 98 apartments with 2 and 3 bedrooms. - south-facing, modern, and sustainable design, with large terraces
- spacious terraces with open views of the natural surroundings and the lake.
- communal swimming pool and landscaped gardens
- subway parking space and storage room Marbella Lake is situated in a privileged position on a hillside with the best panoramic views over the 'Viejo del Angel' lake, the coast of Marbella and the golf courses of Los Naranjos, Las Brisas and Aloha. Only 5 kilometers from Puertio Banus and the heart of the Golf Valley, with easy access to major highways and international airports.

name: Development Artola Homes, new construction in Marbella

EN.title: New development for sale in Marbella, Málaga
EN.description: The Artola Homes residential complex, which has a total of 72 units of 2, 3 and 4 bedrooms, is located in the exclusive location of Cabopino, known as the "Oasis of the Costa del Sol". This project has been designed to offer its residents the greatest luxuries of a resort within their new home, making it the new development of reference in the area. The homes in Artola Homes, a project located on the first line of golf and offering spectacular sea views, have two types: penthouses with solarium and first floor apartments with private garden, all of them characterized by their spacious and perfectly oriented rooms, large windows and magnificent terraces. They also incorporate parking space and storage room included in the price.   The common areas of Artola Homes have been conceived and designed taking into account the commitment to sustainability, with a wide variety of equipment and offering top quality facilities. The residential complex has a fitness room and an indoor swimming pool for the integral care of body and mind. Among the many quality details of Artola Homes, we highlight that the kitchens, island type, will incorporate complete furnishings with top quality furniture, countertop and front in Solid Surface, with full endowment of appliances: washing machine, dishwasher, refrigerator, induction hob, hood, oven, microwave in column, all illuminated with LEDS lights integrated between high and low furniture.   Tailor-made homes with spacious rooms perfectly oriented; large format porcelain floors, large windows both in rooms and in the living room, which allow natural light to enter at any time of day and give access to the magnificent terraces where you can enjoy the best moments of relaxation.the kitchen, designed with leading brands, has been conceived as a whole within the main room: solid surface countertop, integrated appliances and integrated LED lights that provide sophistication and warmth. In the bathrooms we have opted for the elegance of large-format porcelain tiles, a reflection and guarantee of design. All this without forgetting functionality and always offering a proposal of low consumption, meeting the criteria of sustainability, practicality and comfort of Neinor Homes. Its excellent connections to Marbella city and surrounding areas, both by private and public transport, together with its proximity to the Mediterranean Sea, make Artola Homes an ideal project for all those looking to buy a home on the Costa del Sol.

name: Development Marein Natura, new construction in Marbella

EN.title: Introducing Marein Natura - Where Luxury Meets Nature in Marbella!
EN.description:
Discover the epitome of modern living in Marbella with Marein Natura, a prestigious new residential development that perfectly blends elegance and nature. Immerse yourself in a tranquil oasis of comfort and style, as you enjoy the breathtaking surroundings and the finest amenities this development has to offer. Type of Development: Residential
Marein Natura offers an exclusive residential complex designed to cater to your every need. With only two properties available for sale, this is an opportunity to secure your slice of paradise in one of the most sought-after locations in Marbella. Condition: Under Construction, Expected Delivery 2022
Embrace the excitement of envisioning your dream home come to life. Marein Natura is currently under construction, promising to deliver luxury living spaces of the highest quality by 2022. Be one of the privileged few to own a brand-new residence in this magnificent development. Energy Efficiency: Environmentally Conscious Design
Marein Natura takes sustainability seriously, incorporating an innovative aerothermal system for hot water and a ducted heating system, ensuring both comfort and eco-friendliness. With double-glazed exterior carpentry and a brick façade, the development ensures an energy-efficient environment for you to enjoy. Spacious Living: 658-684 m² Building Area
Luxury knows no bounds in Marein Natura, where living space is abundant. These spacious properties boast a generous building area ranging from 658 to 684 square meters, providing ample room for you and your loved ones to create unforgettable memories together. Modern Conveniences: Central Electricity and Video Door Entry
Experience the utmost convenience with central electricity and a state-of-the-art video door entry system, ensuring your safety and security at all times. Rest easy knowing that Marein Natura has taken every precaution to protect and enhance your daily living experience. Prime Location: Marbella's Finest Neighborhood
Nestled in a prime location, Marein Natura offers easy access to Marbella's most iconic landmarks, pristine beaches, world-class golf courses, and an array of gourmet dining options. Experience the perfect balance between tranquility and vibrancy as you explore all that Marbella has to offer. Seize this rare opportunity to be a part of Marein Natura, where luxurious residential living meets the beauty of nature. Secure your future today and indulge in a life of unmatched comfort and sophistication. Contact us now to learn more about this exclusive development and make your dream home a reality at Marein Natura, Marbella's newest gem. Don't miss out on this incredible chance to embrace a life of opulence and serenity.

name: Development Quintessence, new construction in Marbella
location: Carretera Lomas de Marbella, 29603, Marbella, Málaga

EN.title: The new development of Quintessence.
EN.description: Located in Altos de los Monteros, Málaga. This under-construction residential complex offers a collection of boutique apartments designed to the highest standards, providing a luxurious and contemporary living experience in one of the most desirable areas of Marbella. Altos de los Monteros is a thriving neighborhood, known for its growth and development. The residential area features access control and perimeter security, ensuring a safe and tranquil environment for residents. Just a short five-minute drive away, you'll find the stunning beaches of the region. Additionally, the La Cañada shopping center, the historic center of Marbella, and three golf courses are all within a convenient 10-kilometer radius. Quintessence comprises three-story buildings, offering a range of two and three-bedroom apartments. The design of each unit has been meticulously planned, focusing on modern aesthetics and spaciousness. Large windows and expansive terraces allow residents to immerse themselves in the stunning views of the Mediterranean Sea. The apartments showcase impeccable attention to detail and high-quality finishes. With customizable options from a catalog of choices, you have the opportunity to personalize your space according to your preferences. Enhance your terrace with a relaxing jacuzzi or add a touch of elegance to your bathrooms with LED mirror frames. Quintessence offers an array of leisure and wellness amenities for residents to enjoy. The development features two communal swimming pools, including one that is covered for year-round enjoyment. Take advantage of additional facilities such as a spa, Turkish bath, gym, sauna, social club, and a dedicated coworking room. These amenities create an environment where you can relax, rejuvenate, and socialize within the comfort of your own community. Experience the epitome of luxury living in these newly built apartments in Málaga. Contact us today to explore the available units in Quintessence and secure your place in this exceptional residential complex in Altos de los Monteros.

name: Development Lomas del Rey, new construction in Marbella
location: Camino De la Cruz s/n, Marbella, Málaga

EN.title: Description
EN.description: Welcome to the prestigious development of Lomas del Rey, situated in the vibrant city of Marbella, Málaga. This exquisite residential complex presents a unique collection of 24 apartments, penthouses, and duplexes, offering a luxurious and sophisticated living experience in one of the most sought-after locations on the Costa del Sol. Immerse yourself in the beauty of Lomas del Rey, where each property has been meticulously designed to the highest standards. The duplexes boast a modern and elegant aesthetic, featuring exterior carpentry crafted from wood or Climalit, combining style and energy efficiency seamlessly. The heating system utilizes ducts with an installed machine, ensuring optimal comfort throughout the year, while the aerothermal system provides environmentally-friendly hot water solutions. Step into the spacious interiors of these remarkable residences, offering three bedrooms and three bathrooms. The open-plan design of the American-style kitchen creates a seamless flow, complemented by fully equipped modern fittings and exquisite kitchen furniture. With built-in closets, air conditioning, and a combination of bathtubs and shower cabins, these homes provide a perfect balance of practicality and luxury. Step outside onto the terrace, where you can unwind and soak in the enchanting surroundings. Lomas del Rey spans across an expansive land area of 25,000 square meters, providing residents with ample space to enjoy. Discover the joys of the communal swimming pool and embrace the tranquility of the large green areas, creating a serene oasis within the development. The convenience of a secure garage ensures peace of mind and easy parking for residents and their guests. Indulge in the prime location of Lomas del Rey, only a five-minute drive from Puente Romana and Puerto Banus, known for their upscale amenities and vibrant atmosphere. The city center of Marbella is also a short distance away, offering a myriad of entertainment, shopping, and dining options. Enjoy the proximity to the pristine beach, a mere 800 meters away, where you can soak up the sun and revel in the breathtaking views of the Mediterranean Sea. Don't miss your chance to own a brand new property in this extraordinary development. Contact us today to explore the available residences in Lomas del Rey and secure your place in this highly sought-after residential complex in Marbella, Málaga.

name: Development Fairways La Cala Golf, new construction in Mijas
location: La Cala Golf, Calle Lago de Cala Golf, La Cala Resort, 29469, Mijas, Málaga

EN.title: Description
EN.description: Welcome to Fairways La Cala Golf, a magnificent residential development nestled within the renowned La Cala Golf Resort in Mijas, Malaga. Situated in a golfer's paradise, this exceptional complex is surrounded by the largest golf resort in Spain, offering 54 holes, a golf academy, a variety of restaurants, and even a hotel, all just steps away from your new home. While this development is a haven for golf enthusiasts, its location is also ideal for those seeking to embrace the Costa del Sol lifestyle. Just a ten-minute drive from La Cala de Mijas, residents can indulge in six kilometers of beautiful beaches, exceptional restaurants, and beach bars. The area is also rich in amenities, boasting a range of stores and services, including supermarkets, banks, educational centers, and sports academies. The convenient access provided by the A-7 highway allows for easy exploration of nearby towns. Within 20 minutes, you can reach Fuengirola, while Marbella is a short 28-minute drive away. The center of Malaga can be reached in approximately 40 minutes, providing access to the vibrant city and all its attractions. Fairways La Cala Golf offers an unbeatable location, with breathtaking views overlooking the golf course, the mountains, and the sparkling Mediterranean Sea. The development comprises 54 apartments, including stunning penthouses, featuring two and three bedrooms. Each home is thoughtfully designed to maximize comfort and style. The price includes a parking space and a storage room. The residences boast spacious terraces, some reaching up to 110 square meters, allowing you to soak in the panoramic views and bask in the Costa del Sol sunshine. The homes are equipped with state-of-the-art systems, including an aerothermal system that extracts energy from the air in a sustainable manner. Inside, you'll find spacious and bright living rooms, open and fully equipped modern kitchens, and a dressing room in the master bedroom, adding a touch of luxury to your living space. Fairways La Cala Golf offers an array of impressive amenities for residents to enjoy. Dive into the large swimming pool with its beach entry, surrounded by lush gardens. Stay active and fit in the fully equipped gym or indulge in relaxation in the spa area, complete with a jacuzzi and Finnish sauna. Golfers will appreciate the designated area for cleaning equipment and loading golf carts. Experience the epitome of luxury living in Fairways La Cala Golf, where exceptional design, breathtaking views, and world-class amenities converge. Contact us today to secure your place in this remarkable residential development within the prestigious La Cala Golf Resort.

name: Development Mijasol, new construction in Mijas
Development Monterrey Residencial, new construction in Mijas

EN.title: New development for sale in Las Lagunas de Mijas, Malaga
EN.description: Monterrey Residencial is a luxurious complex of 9 exclusive homes with views of the Mediterranean Sea, gardens, an infinity pool that accentuates the views, and a building inspired by Andalusian architecture. 2 and 3-bedroom homes, with 2 bathrooms, garage, and storage room. Located in a magnificent enclave in Mijas Costa, the heart of the Costa del Sol, next to Fuengirola and only 20 minutes from Marbella. A place that has excellent communications with Malaga capital, the Airport, Estepona, Benalmadena, or Puerto Banus. Enjoy a pleasant day at the beach, practice your swing on one of the nearby golf courses, savor Mediterranean cuisine with family or friends at one of the many restaurants, spend a peaceful shopping day at the Miramar shopping center or El Corte Inglés Las Lagunas, have fun at a concert during the exclusive Marenostrum music festival held at Castillo Sohail. The variety and quantity of options are endless! close to any service, you may need and with all the entertainment you can imagine, all while enjoying the unique climate of this area. The nine homes that makeup Monterrey have been meticulously designed and built to the highest construction standards, finishes, and features. In the Monterrey Residential project, maximum use of the location has been sought, optimizing aspects such as orientation, privacy, and respect for the environment. In all our designs, we seek to be respectful of the environment and enhance the environmental characteristics of the place. The penthouses have spacious sun terraces and small hot tubs, while the ground-floor homes have their own private garden. All homes have spacious living rooms with large porcelain tiles, an integrated and fully equipped kitchen with a central island, Silestone countertops, high and low furniture to the ceiling, dishwasher, washer/dryer, refrigerator, ceramic hob, oven, and extractor hood. All bedrooms have electric shutters, and the main bedrooms have an ensuite bathroom and a dressing room or built-in wardrobe. Homes are equipped with a heating and cooling system and underfloor heating in bathrooms. Homes are equipped with home automation systems and anti-theft alarms for your comfort and peace of mind.

EN.title: New development for sale in Mijas, Málaga
EN.description: One Residences is a new development consisting of 80 luxury apartments, distributed in a large complex of 17,200 m2. Both penthouses and first floor apartments have their own private swimming pool and there are options to include summer kitchens and outdoor fireplaces, allowing owners the possibility to make the most of the enviable climate. Each apartment has a contemporary design and offers the best materials and finishes.  The residential complex has magnificent communal areas. The in-house gym offers a state-of-the-art training environment to encourage a healthy lifestyle. If golf is your addiction, you can brush up your skills on the golf simulator between rounds on the neighboring course. The family is fully catered for with the gastrobar, children's entertainment center and a 12-seat private cinema. and a 12-seat private cinema. Even your work Even your work needs are met with the resort's fully equipped business center. At the end At the end of the day, relax and make the most of the residents' wine cellar residents' wine cellar, which offers its own concierge service. Year-round access to the spa and wellness center allows you to take time for yourself. Enjoy an authentic and luxurious spa experience, right at home. The One Residences wellness center includes a Jacuzzi, Turkish steam bath, sauna and water jet circuit. There are pools for all seasons, including the heated indoor pool at the core of the spa center. One Residences is located on the front line of the magnificent Calanova Calanova golf course. The 18-hole, par 72 course, located in the heart of the Mijas Golf Valley, is just a few minutes' walk or buggy ride away. It is also located just 5 minutes from the beautiful town of La Cala, 15 minutes from Marbella and only 20 minutes from Malaga airport.

EN.title: New development in Estepona - Aby Estepona
EN.description: Aby Estepona is a project of 90 homes of 1, 2 and 3 bedrooms and duplexes of 1 and 2 bedrooms, all of them with garage and storage room. Its design has been conceived to achieve large and open spaces to make natural light the protagonist of the house, all with your comfort in mind. Thanks to the tranquility that is breathed in the environment, Aby Estepona becomes the perfect place to live quietly.  The urbanization has very large common areas, designed for you to enjoy the wonderful weather of Estepona. You will have swimming pools for adults and children, landscaped areas with native plants and a social club so that the meetings of friends are the best plan for any time of the year.  90 homes, 133 garages and 90 storage rooms in construction project located in Loma de Arroyo Judío S/N street in Estepona. name: Development El Duende, new construction in Estepona

EN.title: New development for sale in Estepona, Málaga
EN.description: 17 independent villas, each with its own private pool and large green areas of gardens with native plants. Each villa will have 3 or 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, a living room with fireplace separated from the kitchen and dining room by the interior garden, several covered and uncovered terraces, 2 parking spaces, double height ceilings at the entrance, a solarium, and basement, decorative elements of wood and natural stone. The villas have views of the golf course, countryside, and the Mediterranean Sea, in the heart of Estepona Golf, just 5 minutes from the center of Estepona city surrounded by all kinds of services, including international schools, high-resolution hospital and numerous options for leisure and sports practice. Nearby places: Estepona at 5 minutes by car, Marbella at 30 minutes by car, the beach (less than 2 km), town center (less than 7 km), golf course (less than 100 m), Costa Atlantica at 1h by car. The international airport of Malaga is at 1h by car. Deadlines: from 1st quarter of 2023 - to the end of 2024 Surfaces: from 380 m2 built, from 400 m2 plot

name: Development Mesas Homes II, new construction in Estepona

EN.title: Description
EN.description: Introducing Mesas Homes II, a new residential development located in Estepona. This exquisite project offers a total of 84 residential properties ranging from 1 to 4 bedrooms, spread across three distinct residential areas within a well-established neighborhood. Situated just minutes away from the beach, city center, and marina of Estepona, Mesas Homes II provides an ideal location for coastal living. The development encompasses three separate plots, each thoughtfully designed to harmonize comfort and contemporary aesthetics. With a range of orientations available, you can choose the perfect home that suits your preferences and requirements. Abundant natural light fills every unit, illuminating spacious terraces and living rooms, creating an inviting and vibrant ambiance.  Mesas Homes II boasts charming communal areas, including lush gardens and a refreshing swimming pool, where you can enjoy leisurely moments with your loved ones. For the fitness enthusiasts, the larger plot also offers a fully-equipped gym for residents' use and enjoyment.  Committed to sustainability, the common areas of Mesas Homes II are meticulously designed with top-tier facilities and high-quality materials, ensuring a premium living experience. The development features an underground basement with 100 parking spaces and 84 storage rooms, providing convenience and practicality. Each home includes a garage and storage room, both included in the price. Discover your dream apartment in Estepona at Mesas Homes II, where all your needs are met. Immerse yourself in spacious and brilliantly illuminated rooms, with living and dining areas seamlessly connected to expansive terraces, offering breathtaking views.  Don't miss the opportunity to be part of this exceptional residential complex, where design, comfort, and a privileged location converge to create an exceptional living experience.

name: Development Living Estepona, new construction in Estepona

EN.title: New development for sale in Estepona, Málaga
EN.description: Living Estepona is a wonderful Residential Development with only 23 apartments, one 1-bedroom and 22 2-bedroom units located in the center of Estepona, on the Costa del Sol, Malaga. Comfortable and functional spaces, the 2 bedroom apartments have a constructed area ranging from 88m² the smallest, and up to 105m² the largest, with an individual subway parking space and an elevator from the garage to the apartments. The development redefines the Mediterranean lifestyle and reflects it in its architecture, integrating into the Mediterranean style of this southern Spanish villa, all the amenities and typical Andalusian leisure at your doorstep. A step away from the beach of La Rada, a sandy beach of 2.4 km. in the Mediterranean, very large and crowded and has a large number of services.  Living Estepona is one of the last opportunities to acquire a newly built property in the center of Estepona, next to the sea, 1 minute from the beach. A lifestyle dream and achievable for a few.

name: Development Silk, new construction in Estepona
location: Cam. Loma de Retamar, 29688, Estepona, Málaga

EN.title: New development for sale in Estepona, Málaga
EN.description: Silk is a new development located in Estepona, a town on the Costa del Sol, a region that boasts that the sun shines on it an average of 320 days a year. Estepona is characterized by its privileged location, right in the middle of Malaga and Cadiz, two of the most beautiful provinces of Andalusia.  Around the property, there are many services such as a high school, restaurants, golf courses, and much more. In addition, there are natural surroundings such as hiking areas and the Gualdamansa river known in the area as a favorite place for canyoning.  The beach is only five minutes away by car, while its excellent connection to the highway allows you to move wherever you need.  This property of 146 m2 is built on a plot of more than 2000 m2 in which there are gardens, chill-out areas, a covered terrace, and an impressive private pool. From the terrace you access through huge windows to the area that combines living room, dining room and kitchen, the latter being fully equipped luxury and integrated into the decor.  The villa has four bedrooms, one of them on the ground floor overlooking the pool and the other three on the top floor, with the master bedroom having a huge en suite bathroom. The third floor is a large solarium where there is a huge jacuzzi to enjoy the summer nights.

name: Development Estepona Gardens, new construction in Estepona
Development Habitat Valle Romano, new construction in Estepona
location: Calle Perú esquina Calle Flaminio, Estepona, Málaga

EN.title: New development Habitat Valle Romano
EN.description:
Habitat Valle Romano is an exclusive development of 115 homes of 1, 2, 3 and 4 bedrooms with the possibility of choosing between spectacular penthouses or first floor apartments with private gardens. All homes enjoy large windows connected to generous terraces, garage and storage room. Habitat Valle Romano is located in an incomparable natural environment and has been studied in detail to achieve a concept of "open spaces", where functionality and its south orientation makes light the main protagonist. This carefully designed project includes excellent communal areas with two swimming pools for adults and children, a gym and a social club surrounded by spacious gardens designed for you and your family's enjoyment. Habitat Valle Romano has spectacular penthouses with a large terrace and first floor apartments with large private gardens and covered terraces. All looking for the best possible orientation of the Costa del Sol. In the case of the Habitat Valle Romano development, it has been designed by Alberro Arquitectos, who have managed to capture elegance, modernity and functionality in the complex. The homes have the best possible qualities and finishes. Habitat Inmobiliaria's developments have been designed and built under the parameters of the Spatium seal, which makes Habitat Valle Romano a safe and healthy housing development with a swimming pool. Buying an apartment in Estepona in an unbeatable location
The development is located in an idyllic setting, with spectacular views of the sea and the Natural Park Los Reales de Sierra Bermeja. Located next to Estepona, one of the most important centers of the Costa del Sol, a few minutes from the beach and very close to the golf course Valle Romano Golf & Resort and the regional hospital of high resistance of Estepona. It is only 10 minutes from Marbella, 45 minutes from Malaga Airport and perfectly communicated to other municipalities through the AP-7 and A-7 roads. This development is in a privileged area and has all kinds of services very close to it to facilitate the day to day life, such as supermarkets, restaurants, public transport, schools, golf courses and hospital already mentioned, etc.

EN.title: Description
EN.description: Luxury new build villas for sale in Benahavís, Málaga Be Lagom are villas of the XXI century designed with the best qualities by the prestigious architecture studio Gonzalez & Jacobson, with the perfect blend of modernity and the essence of noble materials creating sustainable homes in direct contact with nature. 13 exceptional luxury villas designed with the best materials, ecological homes in direct contact with nature in Benahavís. BREEAM certification for the sustainability of buildings, the highest acoolade in the world. Located in the hills of Benahavís, on the Costa del Sol, with exceptional views of the Mediterranean Sea and the African coast, one of the most desirable destinations in the world, where you can enjoy the best climate in Europe, with an average annual temperature of 20°C and more than 300 days of sunshine a year, which provides several benefits for your health both physically and mentally. The Project is surrounded by some of the best golf courses on the coast such as Atalaya, El Paraíso, Guadalmina or Los Arqueros. Enjoy its more than 5,000 m2 of green spaces with Mediterranean gardens, orchards and pergolas. It is a natural oasis surrounded by forests, fruit trees and flowers but, at the same time, it is located very close to the cosmopolitan urban areas with all the services they offer. A return to organic and ecological, where you can enjoy your own garden and grow natural products, advised and managed by expert farmers.
